description: In Xavier Saldana’s model profile, he makes his sexual preference very clear -- in his own words it’s all about “anal penetration.” With that said, the production team expected him to deliver a performance as a hungry bottom, and he didn’t disappoint. That’s why he was paired up with Sean Duran, who knows how to give a bottom just the right amount of pounding. A favorite moment in the scene, based upon the opinion of your humble porn content writer, is around the 2:38 timestamp. Sean kicks back and Xavier sets out in pleasuring his man orally. Hey, if Xavier is submissive then he might as well work for it all the way. But Sean rewards Xavier for his hard work. Don’t believe me? Check out 21:15 and judge for yourself.
title: Xavier Saldana Gives Up His Puerto Rican Ass To Sean Duran
